column5: -centrally located in Mckinney, yet on one of the last remaining undeveloped roads within city limits in private setting surrounded by farmland, with the authentic feel of living in the country.  -large back patio and deck with hot tub, and country air. -less than 10 minutes drive to four major highways (Hwy 5, Hwy 380, Hwy 75, Hwy 121) -this is a smart home, with a nest thermostat, high speed internet, keyless touchpad entry, applet tv, and blue tooth surround sound on the back deck.
column8: Little Country Home Queen Bed B
